price: I do not know; perhaps this [delay][48] is a test for you[49] and an enjoyment for a while.”
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes:
[48] i.e., this postponement of punishment.
 [49] To increase sin.
